column5: This location is rustic in nature, yet only 20 minutes from San Antonio, Helotes, and Bandera, TX. There is a catch and release fishing pond on property. Bring your own gear. We recommend you fish 'weedless'. There is NO swimming allowed in the pond. There are ducks on property. If you would like to feed them, please ask the owners for treats. There is a 2 night maximum stay at this location, weekends only.
column8: Hill Country RV Fishing Weekenders Paradise
